title: I Interviewed Noam Chomsky About Russia-Ukraine & the Future
description:
Remember to support small YouTube channels like me & SUBSCRIBE.

Noam Chomsky Interviewed on Russia-Ukraine Crisis, China, and linguistics. Professor Noam Chomsky was kind enough to join us for this interview on my Podcast(link below) to talk about the future of the world. Noam Chomsky is an American linguist, philosopher, cognitive scientist, historian, social critic, and political activist. During our interview we jump into a number of topics like rising tensions between Russia and the United States in Ukraine, China in the south China Sea, and Professor Chomsky's theory of universal grammar. My thanks and appreciation to Professor Chomsky for this very special opportunity.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/HumanRedacted

Date of interview: February 11th, 2022

To listen to the full interview check our 'Our Thoughts Tonight' podcast on Spotify or Apple Podcasts. Our website: https://www.ourthoughtstonight.com
